summary:
This mod adds 56 new item enchantments to the game.
mod by Carrier of Echoes
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 56 new item enchantments to the game. 

Disenchantable items carrying the new enchantments are added to levelled lists, so they will show up in loot and in merchant inventories. 

The enchantments should be fairly balanced, but the gold value of the items might not be very consistent. 

Many of the new enchantments grant perks from the skill trees while the item is worn - so you may get access to some of the more fun high-level perks much earlier (and yes - wearing an item which grants a Perk DOES count as having that Perk, for the purposes of getting Perks which depend on it!) 

Q/A---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Q. what if you have a mod that changes a perk? will the enchantment give you said replacer or will it act like normal/not at all?

A. Depends how the other mod is implemented. If it directly makes changes to the perk in the base game, then the perk given by the item will be affected too. However if it actually adds a new perk and inserts that into the skill tree (perhaps being named the same as the one in the base game and replacing it in the skill tree, so that it looks to the player like the perk has been changed directly), then the enchantment will give you the original perk from the base game, not the changed one.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

New Weapon Enchantments: 

* Weakness to Magic 
* Damage Armor 
* Deny Magicka 
* Deny Stamina 
* Drain Unarmed 
* Drain Melee Skill 

New Armor Enchantments: 

* Reflect Damage - Reflects a percentage of melee damage 
* Spell Absorb - % chance to absorb magic attacks 
* Fortify Alteration Strength - Increases the power of Alteration spells 
* Fortify Conjuration Strength - Increases the duration of Conjuration spells 
* Fortify Destruction Strength - Increases the power of Destruction spells 
* Fortify Restoration Strength - Increases the power of Restoration spells 
* Fortify Illusion Strength - Increases the power of Illusion spells 
* Weapon Speed - Increases weapon swing speed. Note that the amount doesn't depend on Enchantment skill or perks, due to a quirk of the engine - so you might as well use petty souls to make this one, just like Waterbreathing.
